mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM post_education where isdelete = '0'
and title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and date(create_time) = #{startTime}
order by update_time desc
order by create_time desc
select a.*, (@rowno:=@rowno+1) AS rowNum from post_education a,(select @rowno:=0+ #{start}) b where a.isdelete=0 order by a.update_time desc limit #{start},1
